description: Try our easy to follow Pork Souvlaki with Greek Feta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Greek salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,BBQ,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Pork Souvlaki with Greek Feta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lemon, 1 juiced, rind finely grated (1 cut into wedges to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pork with oil, lemon juice, lemon rind and 2 teaspoons of the oregano. Season with salt and pepper. Set aside to marinate for at least 1 hour.
Meanwhile, combine tomatoes, cucumber, capsicum and onion in a salad bowl. Sprinkle with remaining oregano and season with salt and pepper. Pour over olive oil and toss to coat. Set aside.
Thread pork onto metal or bamboo skewers. Heat a BBQ or chargrill plate on high heat. Cook skewers for 8 minutes, turning frequently, or until well browned.
To serve, crumble feta over salad. Add olives and parsley. Serve salad with souvlaki skewers and a wedge of lemon.
